['Reduced  Enfeeble cooldown from 10 to 8.', 'Reduced  Brain Sap mana cost from 100/125/150/175 to 70/100/130/160.', "Fixed  Fiend's Grip sometimes not granting True Sight over the target properly."]

['Reduced  Brain Sap mana cost from 125/150/175/200 to 100/125/150/175.', ' Nightmare now causes the target enemy to no longer provide vision.', ' Nightmare End now wakes up every unit put asleep by Bane.']
['Rescaled  Nightmare cooldown from 15 to 16/15/14/13.']

['Changed  Nightmare damage type from HP Removal to Pure.', " Aghanim's Scepter now causes any enemy hero attacking Bane while channeling  Fiend's Grip to be afflicted with his current level of  Nightmare."]
['Reduced  Enfeeble cooldown from 12 to 10.', 'Added a new sub-ability,  Nightmare End, which allows Bane to wake himself up from  Nightmare.']

['Can no longer be dispelled by anything.', 'Increased attack damage reduction from 25/50/75/100 to 30/60/90/120.', ' Enfeeble\nCan no longer be dispelled by anything.\nIncreased attack damage reduction from 25/50/75/100 to 30/60/90/120.', "Increased  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Fiend's Grip duration from 6 to 7."]

['Now reduces a fixed of 25/50/75/100 attack damage, instead of 40%/60%/80%/100% of main attack damage.', 'Reduced cooldown from 15 to 12.', ' Enfeeble\nNow reduces a fixed of 25/50/75/100 attack damage, instead of 40%/60%/80%/100% of main attack damage.\nReduced cooldown from 15 to 12.', 'Reduced  Brain Sap cooldown from 16 to 14.', " Fiend's Grip now gives shared vision of the target."]
[" Aghanim's Scepter now also increases  Fiend's Grip duration from 5 to 6."]
["Reduced  Fiend's Grip cooldown from 120 to 100."]

["Rescaled  Enfeeble attack damage reduction from 30%/60%/90%/120% to 40%/60%/80%/100% (above 100% didn't work properly).", 'Increased  Brain Sap damage/heal from 75/150/225/300 to 90/160/230/300.', ' Nightmare\nFixed not canceling enemy consumables.\nAdded Disablehelp support for Nightmare.', 'Fixed not canceling enemy consumables.', 'Added Disablehelp support for Nightmare.']

['Increased cast range from 500 to 800.', 'Increased attack damage reduction from 20%/40%/60%/80% to 30%/60%/90%/120%.', ' Enfeeble.\nIncreased cast range from 500 to 800.\nIncreased attack damage reduction from 20%/40%/60%/80% to 30%/60%/90%/120%.']
['Reduced  Nightmare cast range from 650 on each level to 500/550/600/650.', " Fiend's Grip now properly stops when running out of mana."]

['Now puts attacking units asleep instantly upon attack start, instead of 0.5 seconds after attack start.', 'Now transfers the nightmare to the attacking unit, instead of putting the attacking unit asleep without waking up the attacked unit.', "Fixed transfered Nightmare's duration being 5/7/9/11, instead of 4/5/6/7.", " Nightmare
Now puts attacking units asleep instantly upon attack start, instead of 0.5 seconds after attack start.
Now transfers the nightmare to the attacking unit, instead of putting the attacking unit asleep without waking up the attacked unit.
Fixed transfered Nightmare's duration being 5/7/9/11, instead of 4/5/6/7."]

['Fixed  Brain Sap requiring channeling and potentially doing nothing when canceled fast enough.']
